entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 in the afternoon except 60 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
